Message Length.description: Controls the typical length of messages

very_short.description: Very brief, concise messages with minimal elaboration

short.description: Brief messages that get to the point quickly

medium.description: Balanced messages with some detail but not overly verbose

long.description: Detailed messages that elaborate on thoughts and feelings

Formality.description: Controls how formal or casual the language is

very_casual.description: Uses slang, abbreviations, emojis, and very informal language

casual.description: Relaxed language with some informal elements

neutral.description: Balanced language that is neither overly formal nor casual

formal.description: Professional language with proper grammar and vocabulary

Expressiveness.description: Controls how emotionally expressive the language is

reserved.description: Subtle emotional cues with restrained expression

expressive.description: Strong emotional language with clear feelings

Text Patterns.description: Special text patterns that characterize the writing style

punctuation_light.description: minimal punctuation often missing periods or commas

abbreviation_heavy.description: uses lots of abbrev. & acronyms w/o explanation

typo_prone.description: occassional typos and misspellings that look natural

standard.description: follows conventional writing patterns with normal punctuation and capitalization
